channel.title: Comments on: My loves
channel.description: tales in the life of Madeline Ann Downey

item.title: By: Christy Grace
item.dc:creator: Christy Grace
item.description: This is totally the most entertaining blog post I have seen on the Interwebs in some time :) Love it!
item.content:encoded: This is totally the most entertaining blog post I have seen on the Interwebs in some time Love it!

item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: promptly after posting this, madeline lost interest in the robot. lol - figures!
item.content:encoded: promptly after posting this, madeline lost interest in the robot. lol – figures!

item.title: By: jessica mullen
item.dc:creator: jessica mullen
item.description: Wow this post made me laugh until I cried. What a treasure for your family to have! <3 I see book potential :]
item.content:encoded: Wow this post made me laugh until I cried. What a treasure for your family to have! <3 I see book potential :]

item.title: By: alma vogt
item.dc:creator: alma vogt
item.description: No longer a wiggle baby but a very busy baby. I'm sure she is keeping you entertained. She is a delightful (very) young lady.
item.content:encoded: No longer a wiggle baby but a very busy baby. I’m sure she is keeping you entertained. She is a delightful (very) young lady.
